rules: Rule1: If the virus outbreak causes school closures, then the health agency contains the crisis situation
Rule2: If the monsoon season occurs, then the health agency contains the crisis situation
Rule3: If emergency services activate flood response, then should the weather service monitor the monsoon season, either drought conditions occur or the monsoon season occurs
Rule4: If flooding causes evacuation orders, then the health agency contains the crisis situation
Rule5: Either flooding causes evacuation orders or flooding causes shelter openings
Rule6: If the virus outbreak causes business shutdowns, then the health agency contains the crisis situation

Rule7: Either the government activates the emergency fund or, provided that emergency services coordinating relief operations does not lead to flooding causing shelter openings resulting in the health agency containing the crisis situation, then the government requests international aid
Rule8: If the government authorizes emergency powers, then emergency services activate flood response
Rule9: If the research team develops an updated vaccine, then the research team develops a new treatment
Rule10: If the research team monitors disease patterns, then should neither drought conditions occur nor the monsoon season occur, the health agency does not issue new guidelines
Rule11: If the virus outbreak triggers emergency response, then either the virus outbreak causes school closures or the virus outbreak causes business shutdowns
Rule12: If the research team develops a vaccine prototype, then the regulatory body approves the vaccine prototype
Rule13: If the government initiates a distribution network, then the government initiates mass production
Rule14: If neither drought conditions occur nor the monsoon season occurs, then the health agency issues new guidelines
Rule15: If the government declaring a state of emergency does not lead to emergency services activating flood response, then the military deploys relief efforts
Rule16: If the government declaring a state of emergency does not lead to emergency services activating flood response, then the military does not deploy relief efforts
Rule17: If the government declaring a state of emergency does not lead to the government authorizing emergency powers, then the government does not implement a curfew
Rule18: If the health agency implementing quarantine zones does not lead to the health agency implementing travel restrictions, then the research team develops a vaccine prototype
Rule19: If the research team developing a vaccine prototype does not lead to the regulatory body not approving the vaccine prototype, then the government initiates a distribution network
Rule20: If the research team developing a vaccine prototype does not lead to the regulatory body not approving the vaccine prototype, then the government does not initiate mass production

Rule21: If the government not declaring a state of emergency leading to the government authorizing emergency powers does not result in the government implementing a curfew, then the government suspends civil liberties

Rule22: If the government not declaring a state of emergency leading to the government authorizing emergency powers does not result in the government implementing a curfew, then the government does not suspend civil liberties
Rule23: If emergency services not activating flood response does not lead to disease mutation not occurring, then the research team develops an updated vaccine
Rule24: If emergency services do not activate flood response, then disease mutation occurs
Rule25: If the health agency does not contain the crisis situation, then the health agency implements quarantine zones
Rule26: If the health agency does not contain the crisis situation, then the health agency does not implement travel restrictions
facts: Fact1: The weather service monitors the monsoon season
Fact2: The government declares a state of emergency
Fact3: Emergency services coordinate relief operations
Fact4: The research team monitors disease patterns
Fact5: The virus outbreak triggers emergency response
Fact6: Drought conditions do not occur
Fact7: The government does not request international aid
Fact8: The government does not activate the emergency fund
Fact9: The research team does not develop a new treatment

question: The health agency contains the crisis situation
